put.description: Create or update General Ledger Codes.
Update custom transaction code mappings. Optional custom general ledger code can also be assigned.

/accounting/v1.0/custom-transaction-code.description: Before transaction custom codes can be retrieved and modified, they must be initialized. This process generates transaction custom code records without any mapping. Once the initialization is complete, the codes can be retrieved and modified.

post.description:
Supported fields for filtering:
  - account_category
  - chart_of_account_type
  - created_at - Same as `transaction_datetime`
  - customer_id
  - custom_code
  - external_relation_id
  - external_relation_kind
  - folio_id
  - id
  - internal_code
  - origin_id
  - parent_id
  - routed_from
  - source_id
  - source_identifier
  - source_kind
  - transaction_datetime
  - trial_balance_id
  - service_date

Supported fields for sorting:
  - created_at - Same as `transaction_datetime`
  - id
  - internal_code
  - source_id
  - transaction_datetime
  - service_date

Example request:
```
  {
    "filters": {
      "and": [
        {
          "operator": "greater_than_or_equal",
          "value": "2019-01-11t08:59:00Z",
          "field": "transaction_datetime"
        },
        {
          "operator": "equals",
          "value": "123",
          "field": "source_id"
        },
        {
          "operator": "equals",
          "value": "RESERVATION",
          "field": "source_kind"
        },
        {
          "or": [
            {
              "operator": "in",
              "value": ["1", "2", "3"],
              "field": "customer_id"
            },
            {
              "operator": "equals",
              "value": "9000",
              "field": "internal_code"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    "pageToken": null,
    "limit": 10,
    "sort": [
      {
        "field": "transaction_datetime",
        "direction": "asc"
      }
    ]
  }

The API has certain constraints for filters so that the system is able to efficiently query the data. Filters must include on of the following:
  - filter by 'id' with condition 'equals' or 'in'
  - filter by both 'source_id' and 'source_kind'
  - filter by both 'external_relation_id' and 'external_relation_kind'
  - filter by transaction_datetime
```

acceptLanguageHeader.name: Accept-Language
acceptLanguageHeader.description:
Language preference for localized tax/fee names.
Supports: en-US (English US), es-ES (Spanish Spain), es-MX (Spanish Mexico), 
fr-FR (French), de-DE (German), it-IT (Italian), pt-PT (Portuguese Portugal), pt-BR (Portuguese Brazil).
Defaults to en-US if not provided or unsupported language is specified.

AnyValue.description: Can be any of supported OpenApi types.

sortDirection.description: Direction for sort - asc or desc

Actions.description: Returns the list of actions available for the transaction

parameters.description: Parameters required for the action, can be any object.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

type.description: REAL_USER - user was found, UNKNOWN_USER - user was not found, SYSTEM_USER - user_id = 0 OR null

code.description: The custom code assigned by the user.

transactionItemCode.description: The system code that cannot be modified.

posItemId.description: POS Item ID for items_services group

limit.description: Optional parameter. Default value is 100, maximum value is 1100.
Optional parameter. Default value is 100, maximum value is 1100.

profileId.description: Profile ID associated with this accounts receivable ledger

propertyId.description: Property ID where the transaction was created.

internalTransactionCode.description: Internal code for the transaction, managed by Cloudbeds.

customTransactionCode.description: Custom code for the transaction, managed by Property.

generalLedgerCustomCode.description: Custom code for general ledger, managed by Property.

currencyScale.description: Number of decimal places for the currency.

currency.description: Currency (ISO code) applied to the amount of the transaction.

customerId.description: Id of the user who perform the transaction, also know as guest id.

rootId.description: Root Id of the transaction, it contains the id of the transaction that is related to it.

parentId.description: Id of the transaction that is parent of this one. For example Tax on top of a rate, tax on top of a fee, etc.

sourceId.description: Id of the source. It is related with the source_kind, so if sourceKind is RESERVATION, is the reservation id.

subSourceId.description: Id of the sub source. At the moment only for reservations that is the booking_room_id.

externalRelationId.description: External relation id, for example if the transaction is a payment it will contain payment id.

externalRelationKind.description: Kind of the external relation id, for example if transaction is a payment it will contain PAYMENT.

originId.description: Id of origin of the transaction. For example if the transaction is created based on a rate, is the rate id.

routedFrom.description: Id of the transaction that was routed from. It can be null.

userId.description: ID of the user who created the transaction

sourceDatetime.description: Date time the source was created. (ISO 8601) in UTC

transactionDatetime.description: Date time when the transaction should be created at. (ISO 8601) in UTC

transactionDatetimePropertyTime.description: Date time when the transaction should be created at base on the property timezone.

serviceDate.description: Date when the posted transaction was created (property time).

createdAt.description: Date time when the transaction was inserted on the database. (ISO 8601) in UTC

sourceIdentifier.description: If source_kind = RESERVATION, this field will contain a reservation identifier. For a transaction with source_kind = GROUP_PROFILE, this field will contain a group code. For source_king = HOUSE_ACCOUNT it will be null.

currencyScale.description: Number of decimal places for the currency.

posted.description: Flag to mark if transaction is posted

postedBalance.description: Posted balance in smallest unit according to the currency.

pendingBalance.description: Pending balance in smallest unit according to the currency.

items.description: List of transaction ids for transferring a deposit

eventId.description: Id of event which will be processed asynchronous.

currencyScale.description: Number of decimal places for the currency

grandTotal.description: Grand total amount in smallest currency unit

subtotal.description: Subtotal amount in smallest currency unit

additionalItems.description: Additional items amount in smallest currency unit

arTransfer.description: Accounts receivable transfer amount in smallest currency unit

amountPaid.description: Amount paid in smallest currency unit

refundIssued.description: Refund issued amount in smallest currency unit

upcomingPayments.description: Upcoming payments amount in smallest currency unit

upcomingRefund.description: Upcoming refund amount in smallest currency unit

cancellationFee.description: Cancellation fee amount in smallest currency unit

noShowFee.description: No show fee amount in smallest currency unit

taxBreakdown.description: Tax breakdown details as array of items with id and amount

feeBreakdown.description: Fee breakdown details as array of items with id and amount

balanceDue.description: Balance due amount in smallest currency unit

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the balance was last updated (UTC)

BalanceBreakdownItem.description: Breakdown item with name and amount for tax or fee breakdown

name.description: The name of the breakdown item (e.g., tax name, fee name)

amount.description: The amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents for USD)

SourceKind.description: Source Kind. At the moment only available RESERVATION | GROUP_PROFILE | HOUSE_ACCOUNT | ACCOUNTS_RECEIVABLE.

configured.description: True if this property has configured trial balance.

NextPageToken.description: Token for fetching the next page of results
